description: Retrieve the value for a key from the StackStorm datastore

scope.description: Scope to retrieve the data from. Default = 'system'

decrypt.description: Decrypt secret if encrypted. Default = false

convert.description: Attempt to convert the string into a hash, array, etc by parsing it as JSON. If an error occurs the string data will be returned. Default = true

api_key.description: StackStorm API key to use for authentication (prefer this over username/password).

auth_token.description: StackStorm auth token. Use this if username/password auth has already been established in a previous task and auth token is being passed around.

username.description: Username to use for StackStorm authentication.

password.description: Password to use for StackStorm authentication.
